summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Spider-Man - The '67 Collection (6 Volume Animated Set) [DVD]
Review Date: 2013/05/03
Store: Paul Soles  (Actor),     Peg Dixon  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Television
Product Description: ['Product Description', "Here they are -- all 52 episodes of Spider-Man's original 1967 classic television series, now completely restored in full color and bursting with spectacular Spidey action! Experience every amazing moment of Spider-Man's first appearance on TV in the animated series that electrified Saturday morning audiences from 1967-1970. Featuring the Web-Slinger's greatest foes, including Dr. Octopus, The Green Goblin, Mysterio, The Rhino, Dr. Magneto, and so many more.", 'Amazon.com', 'Eight years before Tobey Maguire was born, the animated Spider-Man spun his first web across America\'s television screens. The program ran from 1967 through 1970 on ABC, and imprinted its theme song, "Spider-Man, Spider-Man/ Does whatever a spider can / Spins a web, any size / Catches thieves--just like flies" on a generation of viewers.', "The comic book Spider-Man, who debuted in Marvel's", 'Amazing Fantasy', 'in 1962, epitomized the superhero as antihero. During his battles with bizarre villains, Peter Parker was beset by self-doubts and personal problems. The animated Spider-Man was a straightforward action superhero who was too busy performing weird stunts like fashioning a boat and motor out of spider webs to worry or agonize.', 'From the opening titles that announce the program is "in COLOR,"', 'Spider-Man', 'feels dated. When he fights Electro, Spidey can fend off blasts of electricity because he\'s added "just a little asbestos to my web liquid"; when he discovers the extent of his new powers, Peter dreams of a spot on', 'The Ed Sullivan Show', ". Although the directors include Ralph Bakshi and former Disney artist Clyde Geronimi, the animation is extremely limited. The same shots of Spiderman swinging over New York appear again and again. But these limits probably won't trouble nostalgic adults who grew up watching", 'Spider-Man', 'on Saturday mornings: "Wherever there\'s a hang-up / You\'ll find the Spider-Man!" (Unrated, suitable for ages 7 and older: cartoon violence, tobacco use)', '--Charles Solomon']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Animation', 'Format': 'Animated, Box set, Color, NTSC, DVD', 'Contributor': 'Gillie Fenwick, Carl Banas, Peg Dixon, Stan Lee, Len Carlson, Chris Wiggins, Ed McNamara, Tom Harvey, Paul Soles, Bernard Cowan, Billie Mae Richards, Steve Ditko, Paul Kligman, Henry RamerGillie Fenwick, Carl Banas, Peg Dixon, Stan Lee, Len Carlson, Chris Wiggins, Ed McNamara, Tom Harvey, Paul Soles, Bernard Cowan, Billie Mae Richards, Steve Ditko, Paul Kligman, Henry Ramer   See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Mono)', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.75 x 5.5 x 1.25 inches; 14.72 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Animated, Box set, Color, NTSC, DVD', 'Run time': '19 hours and 4 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 29, 2004', 'Actors': 'Paul Soles, Peg Dixon, Paul Kligman, Bernard Cowan, Tom Harvey', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Video', 'Writers': 'Stan Lee, Steve Ditko', 'Number of discs': '6'}
Review Text: I remember watching this series when I was a kid before I went to school. Some of the villains were corny but the bakground was psychadellic
Review Title: WOW-gotta love the 60s
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Winter's Tale (2013) (Blu-ray+DVD)
Review Date: 2016/07/06
Store: Colin Farrell  (Actor),     Jessica Brown Findley  (Actor),     Akiva Goldman  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ["Winter's Tale (Blu-Ray)", 'New York City is subsumed in arctic winds, dark nights, and white lights, its life unfolds, for it is an extraordinary hive of the imagination, the greatest house ever built, and nothing exists that can check its vitality. One night in winter, Peter Lake (Colin Farrell), orphan and master-mechanic, attempts to rob a fortress-like mansion on the Upper West Side. Though he thinks the house is empty, the daughter of the house is home. Thus begins the love between Peter, a middle-aged Irish burglar, and Beverly Penn (Jessica Brown Findlay), a young girl, who is dying.', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama/Love & Romance, Drama', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen, Ultraviolet', 'Contributor': 'Colin Farrell, Akiva Goldman, Jessica Brown Findley', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS 5.1)', 'Runtime': '2 hours', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 5.4 x 6.8 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28941130', 'Director': 'Akiva Goldman', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen, Ultraviolet', 'Run time': '2 hours', 'Release date': 'June 24, 2014', 'Actors': 'Colin Farrell, Jessica Brown Findley', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, Portuguese, French', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: LOVE this movie if you are a romantic and believe that you are meant for a purpose then you will love this movie
Review Title: Awesome Romantic movie
Rating: 5.0

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Suicide Squad (Extended Cut / Blu-ray)
Review Date: 2017/06/05
Store: Will Smith  (Actor),     Jared Leto  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Suicide Squad (Extended Cut/Blu-ray)', 'Suicide Squad: Extended Cut is the must-own version with more action and more Squad! Watch the movie with extra footage not seen in theaters. It feels good to be bad… Assemble a team of the world’s most dangerous, incarcerated Super Villains, provide them with the most powerful arsenal at the government’s disposal, and send them off on a mission to defeat an enigmatic, insuperable entity. U.S. intelligence officer Amanda Waller has determined only a secretly convened group of disparate, despicable individuals with next to nothing to lose will do. However, once they realize they weren’t picked to succeed but chosen for their patent culpability when they inevitably fail, will the Suicide Squad resolve to die trying, or decide it’s every man for himself?', ']]>']
Average Rating: 4.5

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Rite [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2019/04/03
Store: Anthony Hopkins  (Actor),     Colin O'Donoghue  (Actor),     Mikael Håfström  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ['Inspired by true events, this supernatural thriller follows a seminary student (Colin O’Donoghue) sent to study exorcism at the Vatican in spite of his own doubts about the controversial practice and even his own faith. Only when sent to apprentice with legendary Father Lucas (Anthony Hopkins), who has performed thousand of exorcisms, does his armor of skepticism begin to fall. Drawn into a troubling case that seems to transcend even Father Lucas’s skill, the young seminarian glimpses a phenomenon science can’t explain or control – and an evil so violent and terrifying that it forces him to question everything he believes.']
Average Rating: 4.6

Product Title: Spider-Man - The '67 Collection (6 Volume Animated Set) [DVD]
Review Date: 2013/05/03
Store: Paul Soles  (Actor),     Peg Dixon  (Actor)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Television
Product Description: ['Product Description', "Here they are -- all 52 episodes of Spider-Man's original 1967 classic television series, now completely restored in full color and bursting with spectacular Spidey action! Experience every amazing moment of Spider-Man's first appearance on TV in the animated series that electrified Saturday morning audiences from 1967-1970. Featuring the Web-Slinger's greatest foes, including Dr. Octopus, The Green Goblin, Mysterio, The Rhino, Dr. Magneto, and so many more.", 'Amazon.com', 'Eight years before Tobey Maguire was born, the animated Spider-Man spun his first web across America\'s television screens. The program ran from 1967 through 1970 on ABC, and imprinted its theme song, "Spider-Man, Spider-Man/ Does whatever a spider can / Spins a web, any size / Catches thieves--just like flies" on a generation of viewers.', "The comic book Spider-Man, who debuted in Marvel's", 'Amazing Fantasy', 'in 1962, epitomized the superhero as antihero. During his battles with bizarre villains, Peter Parker was beset by self-doubts and personal problems. The animated Spider-Man was a straightforward action superhero who was too busy performing weird stunts like fashioning a boat and motor out of spider webs to worry or agonize.', 'From the opening titles that announce the program is "in COLOR,"', 'Spider-Man', 'feels dated. When he fights Electro, Spidey can fend off blasts of electricity because he\'s added "just a little asbestos to my web liquid"; when he discovers the extent of his new powers, Peter dreams of a spot on', 'The Ed Sullivan Show', ". Although the directors include Ralph Bakshi and former Disney artist Clyde Geronimi, the animation is extremely limited. The same shots of Spiderman swinging over New York appear again and again. But these limits probably won't trouble nostalgic adults who grew up watching", 'Spider-Man', 'on Saturday mornings: "Wherever there\'s a hang-up / You\'ll find the Spider-Man!" (Unrated, suitable for ages 7 and older: cartoon violence, tobacco use)', '--Charles Solomon']
Average Rating: 4.7

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analyzed purchase history reveals a strong preference for movies across various genres, particularly animated classics, romance, and action-adventure films. A consistent high rating average (around 4.5 to 5.0) indicates a high satisfaction level with these selections. The purchaser exhibits a notable inclination toward nostalgic and feel-good films, often expressing emotional connections to childhood memories or romantic narratives, suggesting that they value storytelling and character development.

Recurring themes include a love for classic animation, romantic dramas, and thrilling action, highlighting a balanced interest between light-hearted and suspenseful content. Additionally, the individual demonstrates an affinity for Blu-ray formats and boxed sets, illustrating a preference for high-quality visual and audio experiences in their home entertainment.

Quality appears paramount, as they resonate with films that evoke strong emotional responses or explore philosophical themes, further supported by favorable reviews regardless of content variations. In terms of price sensitivity, while specific budgetary behaviors are not directly indicated, the enthusiasm for purchasing well-regarded editions suggests a willingness to invest in quality over price. Overall, the core preferences reflect a blend of nostalgia, emotional engagement, and a keen appreciation for cinematic quality.

target_interaction.title: Good Journey
target_interaction.text: I like the fact that Elton John was a producer and wanted to share his life, grit and all. Taron Egerton does a fabulous job portraying Elton John, mannerisms and all❤️
description: His music inspires you, his life will surprise you," Rocketman is a one-of-a-kind musical celebration set to Elton John's most beloved songs. Discover how a shy, small-town boy becomes one of the most iconic figures in rock & roll. Featuring an all-star cast, this truly spectacular and utterly electrifying ride is filled with show-stopping musical performances and is "unlike anything you've ever seen" (Jake Hamilton, WFLD-TV (FOX)).
